response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a special owner who will appreciate and cherish it as much as I have. I am offering this product to you at a price of $750,000, which I hope reflects its true worth and allows us to come to a fair agreement. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make a decision.", "product_price": 750000}
